page.title: 12AN 11YR OLD BOYS DAY
page.content: {DAY IN THE LIFE OF A 11YR OLD BOY} Woken at 7-30am by Mother I wash,dress and go downstairs for breakfast.I watch T.V. for 15mins.At 8am my sister leaves for the Comprehensive School in a minibus.I dry the dishes and pack my school bag.The bus arrives at 8-30am. and I arrive at school at 8-50am.At 9am. we have assembly during which one class per week takes.We have maths until 10-40am then a 15min break.We resume with reading then english language.After this we have one hour for school lunch.In the afternoon we have history,geography or P.E.and a ten minute break.At 3-30pm. school is over.I arrive home at 3-50pm. and watch T.V.and do my homework.At 6-30pm. I have a cooked meal and at 9-00pm. I go to bed.
